description: Ecology focuses on the study of the interrelationships that determine the distribution and
abundance of organisms. This core course examines organism-environment interactions and the
study of populations, communities and ecosystems. Consideration is given to use of ecological
studies in ecosystem management. Students attend lectures plus one 3-hour laboratory per week.
Prerequisites: Biology 125 and 126, or Chemistry/Biology 125-127 and Biology 126. Offered each
